text: Gatike yetiya nisid'dha mahasamuha atibahita hai yaba tetiya tomaloke musbaraikasakalaka yaâ€™te'i paba hatya karaiba, sihamtaka graeptara karaiba, araraodha karaiba arau ghamtiye ghamtiye sihamtara babe khapa pati raai thakiba. Kintu yadi sihamte ta'oba karae, chalata kayema karae arau yakata pradana karae tente sihamtara patha erai diba; niscaya allaha atisaya ksamasila, parama dayalu
